sentences.en: Add a spoonful of banana flavoring.
He took a spoonful of the stew and ate it.
I shouldn't have put that extra spoonful of curry powder in this meal, but I suppose we can all be wise after the event.
sentences.cn: 我不应该在这顿饭里多放那一汤匙的咖喱粉, 我想我们都是事后才明白的.

sentences.en: I sniffed the medicine before taking a spoonful of it.
sentences.cn: 我闻了闻药,然后服了一匙.

sentences.en: It'says on the bottle to take a spoonful every four hours.
sentences.cn: 瓶子上的服法指示每四小时服用一匙.

sentences.en: Not too much mile and just half a spoonful for me, please.
sentences.cn: 牛奶不要太多,只要半勺糖.

sentences.en: Please put another spoonful of broth on my bowl.
sentences.cn: 请再舀一匙汤到我的碗里.

sentences.en: Please put another spoonful of broth on my plate.
sentences.cn: 请再舀一匙汤到我的盘子里.

sentences.en: Please take a spoonful of the medicinal liquid each time.
She dissolved a spoonful of sugar in the coffee.
sentences.cn: 她把一勺糖溶在咖啡里.

sentences.en: She put a spoonful of milk in each of the two cups.
sentences.cn: 她在两个杯子里各加了一匙牛奶.

sentences.en: Slote took a spoonful of gummy Scotch broth.
sentences.cn: 斯洛特喝了一匙粘糊糊的苏格兰肉汤.

sentences.en: There was a scant spoonful of sugar.
Tom added a spoonful of sugar to the coffee.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在咖啡里加了一勺糖.

sentences.en: You beg him to try just one spoonful, and he clamps his mouth shut.
sentences.cn: 你求他就尝一匙，可他就是不张嘴。

trans.tran_en: the amount that a spoon will hold
